definition: to work as one (idiom); united in a concerted effort/working hard together
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out

sentences.english: We must take concerted action and cut his claws .
sentences.chinese: 我们必须齐心合力，斩断他的魔爪。

sentences.english: The division of their respective work together, the goal was reached.
sentences.chinese: 他们各自分工齐心合力，目标终于达成。

to unite in common effort

to band together/to gang up/to stick together
